author: gstein
msg: Fix issue 38: the BSD make does not understand $^, so just spell out the
(test/serf_*): replace $^ with explicit list of inputs

author: gstein
msg: Issue 61: fix order of includes to ensure the source directory's includes
take precedence over an installed version of the includes.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Issue 56: Parse and pass along subjectAltName fields to cert check functions.
(This only parses DNS names; IPs and URLs are left as an exercise to reader.)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Send TLS SNI info when available.
(serf_ssl_set_hostname): Add function to tell OpenSSL bucket what host we
(serf_ssl_set_hostname): Set SNI tlsext if our OpenSSL supports it.

author: lgo
msg: Fix authentication fall back from Negotiate to Basic.
(handle_auth_header): Set the status returned to the caller also when authn succeeded,
so that any previous failure - for example when trying Negotiate first but then
falling back to Basic - gets cleared.
